name: engraving

[ U ] the activity of engraving
[ C ] a picture printed onto paper from a piece of wood or metal into which the design has been cut

a picture or design printed on paper from a hard, usually metal, surface in which cuts have been made, or this process: [ C ] The museum owns many fine 18th-century engravings. [ U ] The book describes the art of engraving.
